mapper.insert: INSERT into content(CONTENT_ID, TITLE, BODY, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE, CATEGORY_ID, USER_EMAIL) values (CONTENT_SEQ.nextval, #{title}, #{body}, sysdate, sysdate, #{categoryId},#{userEmail})
mapper.select: select CONTENT_ID, TITLE, BODY, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE, CATEGORY_ID, USER_EMAIL from CONTENT where CATEGORY_ID > 0 AND CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId}
select count(*) from content where CONTENT_ID > 0 and CATEGORY_ID = #{category}
